Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Leviathan Drive and Neilian Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Neilian Drive, which runs east and west, intersects Leviathan Drive, which runs north and south. You can see the raging river Othax to the north and the Karlberg Bridge which connects the two sides of Leviathan Drive together.
